summary.notes: Semgrep Rust support is limited. D1_EMPTY_CATCH patterns not detectable.

empty_catch.rs.notes: Semgrep cannot detect Rust Result/Option error discarding patterns

sql_injection.rs.notes: Semgrep Rust SQL injection detection is not available with current rulesets

hardcoded_secrets.rs.notes: Semgrep Rust secret detection is not available with current rulesets
